title: False story about fire hoses running dry during 1963 Birmingham Civil Rights protests spreads online
description: A rumor circulating online accurately described an event in the Civil Rights Movement protests on May 4, 1963, in Birmingham, Alabama, in which fire hoses being used on demonstrators mysteriously went dry.
